text: (dutare,) allahanu nimage nim'ma kanasinalli avarannu (satru padeyannu) kadimeyagi kanisiddanu â€“ ondu vele avanu nimage, avarannu bahalavagi kanisiddare nivella hinjariyuttiddiri mattu a (yud'dhada) visayadalli bhinnamata taluttiddiri. Adare allahanu raksisidanu. Khanditavagiyu avanu manadolagina visayagalannu aritiruttane
